name: Salomon Elevate Warm Beanie - Women's
description: The cherry on top. This cold-weather toque is sweat wicking to keep you dry when you’re working hard. Reflective elements, a sweatband, and a spot for your ponytail come together to create a truly versatile beanie that will be on heavy on your gear rotation this season.Made of AdvancedSkin Warm stretch polyester with a cozy brushed finish.Internal sweatband wicks moisture and is smooth against skin.Rear ponytail port keeps your hair in check.Reflective details keep you visible on night training missions.
